title: IDs don't match
cause: The ${featureContainerResource} ID in the body does not match the resource ID in the path.

title: Missing feature ID(s)
cause: At least one feature ID should be provided as a query parameter.

title: ${featureContainerResource} modification is not allowed
cause: It's not permitted to perform modifications through context ${context}.

title: Resource not found
cause: The requested resource does not exist.
action: Please check if the path is correct

title: ${featureContainerResource} not found
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: Extended ${featureContainerResource} not found
cause: Extended ${featureContainerResource} with ID ${resourceId} was not found
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: ${resource} not found
action: Please check if requested ID ${resourceId} is correct

title: ${featureContainerResource} is not active
cause: The method is not allowed, because the resource ${resourceId} is not active.

title: ${featureContainerResource} is marked as read-only
cause: The method is not allowed, because the resource ${resourceId} is marked as read-only.
action: Update the resource definition to enable editing of features.
